This PR aims to add 2 more helper functions to dmpnn_featurizer.py and other small changes.

## Description
  ### What are we doing here?
  ============================

  This commit modifies the bond_feature() function in graph_features.py by adding a use_extended_chirality boolean 
  condition. It also adds the bond_feature(), reaction mapping function and modifies atom_feature() in dmpnn_featurizer.py 
  file.

  It also adds suitable unit tests for all the added/modified changes.

  ============================
  
  An extra condition was added in the bond_features() function to incorporate the use of chirality of 6 different types for

This PR modifies `RDKitDescriptors` class for normalized descriptors

## Description
### What are we doing here?
============================

- This PR modifies the existing `RDKitDescriptors` class.
- Creates `DescriptorsNormalizationParameters` class in `rdkit_utils.py`.
- Creates additional unit tests for the `RDKitDescriptors` class.
